metadata.name: Spot Painting Variation K1
metadata.description:
The analogue original for this NFT artwork was made by me using the historical photographic process of cyanotype and pure gold leaf on fine handmade paper. For this purpose, I applied this photographic process freely, similar to a photochemical painting. The image was exposed in the summer evening sun, followed by rinsing and fixing with water. After drying, I applied the gold ground and the pure gold leaf.
For the digital processing I resorted to the possibility of alienating an image kaleidoscopically. This preserves the original character and yet creates something new.
I would be happy if the pictures and videos in this collection inspire many people and enrich their lives.
